pull.title: Fixed miner test values, gave constants for less error-prone values.
pull.body: Based on discussion in #7784 I decided to do a bit more cleanup.

events.body: Doing this I noticed yet another mis-typed value on https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7807/files#diff-5c64500485fda76388a86c95c0059585L173 , so it seemed worthwhile.
As you are not replacing constants only, can you please change it so that you first replace constants unchanged and then do the changes, ie two commits? It will make review much easier...
@instagibbs Reading this thoroughly, I think we could also define constants in the term of COIN and CENT, it could be even more descriptive.

events.message: Gave miner test values constants for less error-prone values.
